function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of vector-borne diseases","Impact":"High morbidity and mortality, especially in tropical and subtropical regions","Mitigation":"Vector control, public health education, vaccination programs","Technologies":"Mosquito nets, insecticides, vaccines","People":"Populations living in tropical and subtropical regions","Owner":"Public health authorities, government agencies"},{"Description":"Co-endemicity of multiple vector-borne diseases","Impact":"Increased risk of multiple infections and complex disease outcomes","Mitigation":"Integrated vector management, surveillance, and early detection","Technologies":"Diagnostic tools, surveillance systems","People":"Populations living in areas with multiple VBDs","Owner":"Health organizations, research institutions"},{"Description":"Neglect of neglected tropical diseases (NTDs)","Impact":"Lack of prioritization, investment, and understanding leading to continued high morbidity","Mitigation":"Increased prioritization, funding, research, and public health interventions","Technologies":"Research and diagnostic tools, public health campaigns","People":"Populations affected by neglected tropical diseases","Owner":"Government agencies, public health organizations"}]}
